oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.publicModel
Interface AttachmentsChangeListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public interface AttachmentsChangeListener
extends java.io.Serializable

Classes wishing to implement their own business logic based on the addition, removal or modification of attachments must implement this class. It is called when the attachments rows for an attachments view object are added, removed or modified. Use AttachmentsHelper to add and remove this listener to an attachments view object.

To support high availability, classes implementing this interface must be Serializable and should implement equals. Serialization is needed for passivation. Equals is used by the AttachmentsHelper.containsChangeListener(...). When the class is reactivated the class will be a new instance of the class not a reference.

Since:
11.1.1.7.3
Version:
$Header: atgpf/applcore/applications/Attachments/Model/src/oracle/apps/fnd/applcore/attachments/publicModel/AttachmentsChangeListener.java /st_atgpf_11.1.1.7.3/1 2014/02/04 14:33:29 ncornish Exp $

Method Detail

includeOldRow

boolean includeOldRow()

Determines whether the processChange(AttachmentsChangeEvent) method contains the old Attachment in addition to the new Attachment.

Returns:
true iff the AttachmentsChangeEvent contains the old Attachment.

processChange

void processChange(AttachmentsChangeEvent event)

Called whenever the Attachments row has been added, deleted or modified.

Parameters:
event - contains the data about the attachment row that has just been added, deleted or modified.
